title: praNavaakaram
sahitya:
praNavaakaaram siddhivinaayakam

prasanna smita vadanam anubhaavayE

(praNavaakaaram)



anupallavi



, gaNanaayakam nikhilabhuvana mangaLa varadaayakam

maNigaNa kiraNa naanavida kalpa dharaNam

lOka kaaraNam

(praNavaakaaram)



caraNam 1



abi samvrita shiva gaNa sura gaNa mahaataananda naTanam

tundubi DinDima mridanga Tamaruha rava 

drimita drimita samacala caraNam

(praNavaakaaram)



caraNam 2



karuNaarasa varshana mukhakamalam kaatyaayani bhalapradam

nandakumaara laptiva rampradamadishaya lambOdara vikaTaraaja mamalam

(praNavaakaaram)
